verses.verse: (For the choir director; according to Mahalath. A Maskil of David.) The fool <S%H5036><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> in his heart, <S%H3820><s%> "There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> God, <S%H430><s%>" They are corrupt, <S%H7843><s%> and have committed <S%H8581><s%> abominable <S%H8581><s%> injustice; <S%H5766><s%> There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> who does <S%H6213><s%> good. <S%H9185><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> has looked <S%H8259><s%> down <S%H8259><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> upon the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> To see <S%H7200><s%> if there <S%H3426><s%> is anyone who understands, <S%H7919><s%> Who seeks <S%H1875><s%> after God. <S%H430><s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> one <S%H3605><s%> of them has turned <S%H5472><s%> aside; <S%H5472><s%> together <S%H9191><s%> they have become <S%H444><s%> corrupt; <S%H444><s%> There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> who does <S%H6213><s%> good, <S%H9185><s%> not even <S%H1571><s%> one. <S%H259><s%>

Have <S%H3045><s%> the workers <S%H6466><s%> of wickedness <S%H205><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> knowledge, <S%H3045><s%> Who eat <S%H398><s%> up My people <S%H5971><s%> [as though] they ate <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> And have not called <S%H7121><s%> upon God <S%H430><s%>?

There <S%H8033><s%> they were in great <S%H6343><s%> fear <S%H6343><s%> [where] no <S%H3808><s%> fear <S%H6343><s%> had been; <S%H1961><s%> For God <S%H430><s%> scattered <S%H6340><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> of him who encamped <S%H2583><s%> against you; You put <S%H954><s%> [them] to shame, <S%H954><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had rejected <S%H3988><s%> them.

Oh, <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> that the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> would come out of Zion! <S%H6726><s%> When God <S%H430><s%> restores <S%H7725><s%> His captive <S%H7622><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> Let Jacob <S%H3290><s%> rejoice, <S%H1523><s%> let Israel <S%H3478><s%> be glad. <S%H8055><s%>
